name: Mahjong Solitaire (itch) (everrethamilton)
description:
Casual mahjong solitaire tile matching game. The goal is to match
pairs of mahjong solitaire tiles and expose the tiles beneath them in the pyramid. You win by removing all of the mahjong solitaire tiles from the board.

This Mahjong solitaire tile game has several different levels.

There is an undo, redo, and reset function for when you get stuck on difficult levels.

Notes from developer:

Hello everyone. This is my Mahjong Solitaire game that I made for mobile and now I am porting to PC. I hope you enjoy this classic puzzle matching board game.
